description:
Perfect Hideaway/Beach House
The perfect holiday home awaits, with easy access to the Cowes foreshore and boating facilities. The single level home has ample room for a large family, with the perfect man cave to add to the mix. All options are available with the potential for a holiday rental income. With so much potential to put your own personality on, let your creativity run wild!

The complete package
This bright and comfortable home is ideally situated in an established estate of Cowes, close to playgrounds, parkland and only a short stroll to the main street.
The home comprises of three bedrooms, two of which have built in robes and the master bedroom featuring it's own walk in robe and ensuite. The open plan kitchen/living & dining space features stainless steel appliances, floating floors and access to an undercover alfresco area. Additionally the home features a second living area, split system heating and cooling, ducted vacuum and plenty of storage space.
The spacious 519m2 (approx) allotment is fully fenced complete with double garage, water tank, garden shed and established gardens.
This immaculately presented home offers plenty of space for all the family or would make an ideal investment for the astute purchaser.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

SPACIOUS, PRIVATE & ON 1 ACRE
The ideal family home awaits with plenty of open space over this acre allotment. This light filled and spacious open plan living zone is the focal point of the home. The separate wing offers flexibility and a second living area with 3 additional bedrooms. Think endless summer evenings entertaining family and friends on the large decking area.
The large 4 bay shed is perfect for those that need large storage for both & caravans, or cars and is complete with kitchen, bathroom and wood fire.
This highly is sought after lifestyle property has also got potential for future subdivision (STCA)
if you choose or simply leave as is and enjoy.
For a private inspection call Kendall O'Garey 0410595130

Walk To Everything!
With a lovely rural outlook situated in a sought after location in Cowes, is this delightful split level home offering a spacious light filled open plan living area, three bedrooms and one bathroom. The upper level of this beautifully presented home features cathedral ceilings with exposed beams in the upstairs living, kitchen and dining area giving it a fantastic sense of space. From here a sliding door opens onto an outdoor alfresco area perfect for entertaining.
The three good sized bedrooms, located on the lower level, including built in robes in two of the rooms all share the family bathroom. The double carport has the potential to be built in for further living or accommodation space.
This impressive allotment of approximately 653sqm approx is fully fenced with low maintenance surrounds providing plenty of space to enjoy the outdoors or further enhance. Nearby shops, supermarkets, beach and RSL are all within easy walking distance making this a wonderful opportunity to secure your permanent home or holiday retreat in this fabulous location.
Other great features of this very appealing home include split system heating and cooling, timber look flooring on the upper level.

BRAND NEW FOUR BEDROOM HOME SHEARWATER ESTATE
As you walk into the home you feel the spaciousness of this home with the light filled northern aspect of the kitchen, dining and main living area. The master bedroom/retreat is huge with a full walk in wardrobe and private ensuite.
The 3 large additional bedrooms give you plenty of room for your family and guests. The first living space provides a separate zone which can be used as a living zone, media room, or even an office. The second living space adjoins the large kitchen with stone bench tops, 900m stainless steel oven and cook top and opens up to a rear courtyard this is ideal area for that morning coffee and catching up on the daily news.
In addition the home is positioned on the allotment to maximize the side access.

CONTEMPORARY AND BESPOKE IN DESIGN
This beautiful home has everything and more you look for in modern low maintenance living. Designed by Ashley Beaumont, and hand built by a renowned local builder, this light filled home will impress you with its design and style.
Set on an elevated corner allotment with views across open fields to Westernport and Rhyl Inlet, the home will suit those looking for something that is the next step up. Features include:
An entertainers kitchen with Stainless steel and ceaser stone bench tops
A walk in butlers pantry complete with a second oven and SS sink.

Corner Block
This fabulous corner block of land with a northern entrance, flat with dual entrance potential is 470m2.
Set among established homes in this established estate with water features, parks and bar b q areas, it conveniently supplies its own gas which can be plumbed in directly, no need for gas bottles.

Simply Fresh and Sweet
This cute little tucked away home gives a feeling of sanctuary on a low maintenance block with a double lock garage. A secure and fully fenced approx. 500sqm block provides the perfect safe space for a young family or simply enjoy your little piece of the world. Imagine sitting on the deck under the shade of a beautiful mature tree and watching the kids play below. Entering this quaint home you'll find there is nothing you need to do, simply sit back and relax. The property offers lovely timber flooring, double BIR's in all the bedrooms, modern appliances in a fresh new kitchen, lovely new bathroom, block out blinds on all windows and a split system to keep you cool in summer and warm in winter. Simply retire here, holiday here or start a family here.

Peaceful Parklands
On offer is this beautifully presented two-bedroom unit in the heart of Cowes. With everything at your doorstep, this low maintenance property could be what you have been searching for.
The unit features two spacious bedrooms, both with built in robes, the dual access bathroom which doubles as the ensuite to the master bedroom, laundry, and kitchen/dining/living space.
Other features include; private rear courtyard, split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans, single car garage, ample storage throughout and carpet, tile and vinyl plank flooring throughout.
Located within easy walking distance to the main shopping precinct, cafes, restaurants, primary school and medical hub on a 134 sqm approx. allotment.
This property in Cowes in proudly presented to you by Ray White Phillip Island.

READY TO MOVE RIGHT IN RED ROCKS BEACH AREA
Situated on the high side of Red Rocks Road offering some water views from the front deck and lounge room, located in the much sought-after area of Red Rocks only a short walk to the North facing Beach.
This Beautiful home will be the perfect place to relocate be it holiday or permanent living.
As you walk in you are greeted with a large open living space with newly installed split system heating and cooling, central kitchen and separate dining area.
This open plan living space opens onto the rear and front deck offering lots of entertaining space for all seasons.
In addition, there is 3 large bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

address: Villa 173/2128 Phillip Island Road Cowes VIC 3922
description:
Affordable Lifestyle Opportunity
An affordable lifestyle opportunity within the beautiful Ramada Resort located on pristine Phillip Island. An easy 1.5 hour drive from Melbourne. Being out of the rental pool it gives flexibility of your own holiday usage and holiday renting options.(PLEASE NOTE YOU CANNOT LIVE IN THE VILLAS)
Fully furnished It consists of 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms (1 en-suite), and a bright and sunny open plan living, dining and kitchen opening onto a great sized deck to relax among the trees.
The resort offers a choice of shared heated indoor and outdoor pools, a cafe/bar, indoor gym, games room and walking trails full of wildlife.
All of this is within a short drive to Cowes CBD, beautiful bay beaches and famous surf beaches.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection!

Warley Water Views!
This superior apartment located in the prestigious Bayview Grande is perfectly situated only 50 metres from the beach and within a minute's walk of restaurants, shops and wine bars. All the luxuries you would expect in a residence of this calibre featuring three bedrooms, two bathrooms, large balcony and a terrace providing beautiful bay views and coastal breezes.
The light-filled apartment tiled throughout, comprises of a spacious main bedroom, full ensuite, walk in robe, separate shower and spa bath. Opposite the family bathroom includes two further guests bedrooms with built in robes and a separate laundry.
Living and dining blends seamlessly with the tiled terrace including glass balustrades to enjoy the seaside ambiance. A pop of red in the kitchen splashbacks, stainless steel appliances, electric oven and hotplates, dishwasher and ample storage provide all you need to entertain the guests with ease.
With warm neutral tones this contemporary style and spacious ground floor apartment is perfect for low maintenance permanent living, fabulous holiday retreat or the lucrative holiday/permanent rental market.
Highlights include secure car park space, split system heating and cooling and access to the Bayview Grande's indoor swimming facilities.
Contact us today to organise a private or virtual inspection.

For The Families Who Stay Together - Two luxury homes - With Bay Views!
Open For Inspections - You Must Register Limited People Viewing
COVID -19
Have you or anyone whom you have been in contact, been diagnosed with COVID-19
Full Names, Addresses with Photo ID must be sent to Sales Agent 0437441127 Prior to viewing this property
Welcome to what could be your next dream purchase sitting high on the hill in the most beautiful estate on the Island. This 5 star rating, 60 squares under roof-line high-end property comprising of two well appointed homes offers multiple opportunities for the most fastidious of buyers.
With no expense spared, you are welcomed as you glide through the main entry by the rich and stunning Black-butt floors flowing through-out the main home and a view from the pool to the Bay. Leading the way to the hub of the main home and be pleasantly surprised by the stunning open-plan living areas, soaring roof-line, loads of natural light and a dream hostess kitchen with butlers pantry, Ceasarstone bench-tops, self cleaning oven and quality appliances.
Every consideration has been addressed when designing this luxury property ideal for the largest of families and entertaining with the outdoor living space flowing from the main living leading to a built in Pizza oven and BBQ area adjacent to the sparkling salt/chlorinated water pool.
With open-plan living areas, 7 bedrooms in total ( 4 with beautifully appointed en-suites ), bathrooms with grand walk-in showers and a free standing bath to soak your cares away, you are going to love where you live.
Open up your home and enjoy the clear country sea breezes while taking in the views of the Bay from various positions through-out the property while in the cooler months, tuck in, get the ducted wood fire going and enjoy your favourite movie with a hit of the button to expose the well hidden remote Cinema screen when not in use.
If attention to detail is important, you will appreciate the quality and abundance of this property with its luxury bathrooms, electric interior windows, surround sound, NBN & multiple hard wire data points. There is ample storage spaces with room for a wine cellar, home office and all the toys.
Running a business from home is made easy for a professional, supplier or tradie with the Taj Mahal of under roof-line garaging and multiple available areas. Otherwise simply occupy extended family or holiday let the 2nd home for a healthy income. The choices are abundant.
Highlights:
Bay Views
2 Homes of approx. 60 sq total on one title
Income Opportunity
DBL glazed commercial grade windows with some offering complete privacy 24/7.
1.3 km to beach
High end luxury through-out
Cinema screen, projector and surround sound
Only a short drive to all the attractions Phillip Island has to offer
PHOTO ID REQUIRED ON ENTRY

NOTHING TO DO READY TO MOVE IN!
This stunning home is a perfect example of clever design. Full of style and flair with a great outdoor entertaining area perfect for any occasion. This home would be ideal for a young family, investor or downsizer looking to make the sea change to Phillip Island. Offering 3 bedrooms including a Master bedroom with ensuite and large walk in robe. The overall layout of the house offers fantastic space to accommodate all your needs.
From the moment you enter the home you will notice the house has been designed for easy living. An open plan lounge and kitchen area leads through to a generous outdoor entertaining area. The large kitchen area has top of the range appliances.

Comfortable living in this stylish home
This stylish Aspire Designer built, single level home combines modern living and family friendly enjoyment.
Well positioned in the popular Shearwater Estate, residents will enjoy the wonderful location only a short stroll from Silverleaves beach, shops, primary schools and the Cowes Golf Club.
The well appointed and contemporary kitchen is complemented by marble look stone benchtops, walk in pantry and stainless-steel appliances including a 900mm gas cooktop/electric oven and dishwasher.
Offering four spacious robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master bedroom is complete with a walk-in robe, ensuite and access to the rear alfresco area.
The light filled open plan living/kitchen/dining area flows effortlessly out to the undercover North facing decking which overlooks the lovely established low maintenance surrounds.
Other great features include reverse cycle heating/cooling, LED lights, floating floorboards, bath, ample storage including a walk in linen, double garage, garden shed and side access.
All of this is set within a 503sqm approx. fully fenced allotment with lovely established surrounds, this property currently has a great permanent tenancy in place.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Large titled flat block
Getting hard to find in a larger size and at almost 19 meters wide this great flat block is titled and ready to build on now or keep for the future and build whenever your ready with full services available.
Take advantage of the new Federal Government Home Builder Grant - Applicable for any new build for contracts entered into from June 4th 2020 to the 31st December 2020!
Close to the park and lake plus within walking distance to the beach and main street its location is perfect.
Get in quick wont last.

Central Cowes Lifestyle!
Situated just metres to the foreshore is this luxury apartment right in the heart of Cowes offering a fabulous holiday lifestyle experience.
The large and light-filled open plan kitchen, living and dining area with beautiful polished timber floors throughout has huge floor to ceiling glass sliding doors that open onto a private north facing balcony with water glimpses of the bay providing a wonderful space to relax and entertain.
Accommodation comprises three good size bedrooms including the main bedroom with an ensuite whilst all rooms include built in robes and a small study desk. The main bathroom includes a spa bath with a shower over and there is also a European style laundry complete with a washing machine and dryer.
The apartment is being sold fully furnished and boasts great features including split system heating and cooling, dishwasher and off street parking as well as having the use of the pool and spa and barbecue facilities.
Within metres to all of your shopping needs including restaurants, cafes and bars, the property is also only a short drive to many of the Islands amazing beaches, wineries and other fantastic attractions.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

BRAND NEW TOWNHOUSE PRIVATE YARD
As you walk in the front door you are greeted with a grand opening giving you a sense of space and light which continues through the whole property.
The lower level offers a cosy lounge room with a northerly aspect, split system air conditioning/heating offering year around comfort. The hostess kitchen is a real treat and central to this unique property that offers plenty of cupboard space, dishwasher and large stone bench tops, with big windows for warmth and natural light. The master bedroom is located on this level with full ensuite facilities and a walk in shower. A powder room just off the huge laundry area gives you the 3rd amenities area. With access into your new townhouse through the laundry via the remote control garage.

Coastal Inspired Seaside Hideaway
On offer in this highly sought after and exclusive location in Cowes, is this charming and recently renovated double story home.
Offering privacy, stunning views to Westernport Bay, and a tranquil setting - this is a rare opportunity to secure this coastal inspired seaside hideaway.
The floorplan of this home makes this a very appealing property for all buyer demographics, with living/kitchen/dining and the master suite, all situated on the bottom level.
You are treated to water views from all the north facing windows on this level, which can also be enjoyed on the north facing front verandah.
Completing the ground floor is a conservatory or garden room, study / home office, bathroom, WC and separate laundry.
Upstairs you will find the second spacious living area which extends out to another north facing balcony where you are spoilt by the most spectacular water views in the property. Two further bedrooms with built in robes, and a second bathroom - creating an ideal space for guests.
Tastefully decorated throughout with stunning wormy chestnut timber floors, new quality carpets, neutral colour scheme, and north facing windows - bathing the home in natural light, the home has a calming ambiance, and true coastal vibe.
Other features included:- High ceilings, split system heating and cooling, water tanks, and double garage.
With a private beach access track from the front of the property, and an easy 2km approx. stroll into Thompson Avenue, it is Ideally suited for holiday or permanent living, or as a coastal investment.
Inspections available by private appointment only.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate, Phillip Island.

ESCAPE THE EVERYDAY
This is the perfect island getaway. Close to the north facing beaches of Cowes and within easy walking distance to the centre of town, with its shops, restaurants and cafes.
Situated in a quiet street, on a fully fenced allotment, this 2 bedroom home offers a relaxed getaway from the hustle and bustle.

Relaxed Coastal Living
Set in a lovely quiet court on a lush and gently sloping allotment of approximately 789 square metres is this fabulous single level home providing a comfortable floor plan with lovely spacious rooms. The immaculately presented home is positioned beautifully on the block to make the most of the warm northerly aspect with the kitchen and living areas designed to overlook the vast green lawn and garden. The kitchen is well appointed with great storage and plenty of bench space and is central to both living areas which makes entertaining a breeze. From the main living area a sliding door opens to a private and covered alfresco area overlooking the tranquil environment.
The master bedroom has a fabulous dressing room and great size ensuite while the remaining two bedrooms and family bathroom are located off the main living area to the rear of the home. The living area has a cosy wood fire, split system heating and cooling and carpet throughout providing a really relaxing space.
Outdoors the property is fully fenced with double gates for access to a single carport and a concrete driveway leads to the double garage with remote control doors. There is also a storage shed at the rear.
With the shops, beaches and schools only minutes away and only a short walk to the RSL, this property presents an amazing opportunity and would suit as a great coastal permanent home or weekend retreat!
